## Review Triage (Implementation vs Product/Policy)
For each non-trivial review comment, classify it and record the decision.

| Item | Classification | Decision | Owner | Link |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | `implementation` / `product-policy` | address now / follow-up | @handle | issue/pr/comment |

## Product/Policy Decision Gates
If any answer is "Yes", open/attach a product-policy follow-up before merge.

- [ ] Changes tenant isolation/security boundaries?
- [ ] Changes customer-visible API contract or route semantics?
- [ ] Changes permissions/entitlements (RBAC roles/scopes)?
- [ ] Changes data policy/migration behavior (uniqueness, retention, backfill)?
- [ ] Changes compliance/privacy/audit expectations?

If any box is checked, include:
- Decision owner:
- Follow-up link:
- Rollout and rollback note:
